description.value: This profile defines the NHS England constraints and extensions on the UK Core FHIR resource.

purpose.value: This profile defines the NHS England constraints and extensions on the UK Core FHIR resource.

human.value: If both low and high present, both should use the same units or both should have units absent

expression.value: low.empty() or high.empty() or (low.unit = high.unit) or (low.unit.empty() and high.unit.empty())
